company_commercial_names: adi designs | adi | bespoke product design & development
short_description: adi designs is a decorators & interior designer based in singapore.
long_description: we are an engineering design company offering end-to-end product development services: concept, design, prototyping, testing, and full product builds. we specialise in creating beautiful product that works. adi is a design-fluid agency. we prefer to design without boundaries of labels. we believe we need to be researchers, scientists, philosophers, engineers and artist; whatever roles of expertise and perspectives needed to create impactful products. product development is risky, therefore we want to be careful with your resource and time to ensure our design actions are effective. invent patented technologies for our clients. avoid is a wearable injection lock that is integrated with hospital emr database to trace the medicine administration in the icu. scorpio is a robotic platform adi developed to automate the process of building audition, with features such as auto-navigation, object detection and fleet management system. founded in 2016, adi has provided tailor-made product development services for many satisfied brands, across a wide range of industries and fields.

generated_description: adi | bespoke product design & development is a design and engineering company based in singapore. founded in 2016, the company specializes in end-to-end product development services, including concept creation, design, prototyping, testing, and full product builds. adi focuses on creating innovative and functional products, often integrating advanced technologies such as ai and robotics. the company is known for its dynamic path planning methodology, which helps in efficiently navigating the product development process. adi has worked on various projects, including wearable medical devices like avoid and experimental consumer products like shiok, as well as robotic platforms like scorpio.
